body:
in this room, guilds are created and lost. In this room, creative ideas spring to Kuri, only to die down in the ashes upon the flames it arose from. Large tables and piles of blank parchment sit upon the tables that lay pushed put against all the walls. One man stands behind a counter in the back of the room, he is a rather odd looking fellow. Several different signs and other various lists hang about the room; perhaps you should read them all before deciding your next move.
There is a list of guidelines that you can read here.
title: Center of Guilds
